Description.val: Funding provides for the procurement of High Efficiency Small-Capacity (HES-C) Air Conditioning Compressors and Power Management Platform (PMP) for the LHD Midlife Program.  HES-C provides additional air conditioning capability to support growing electronic cooling requirements.  PMP manages the generation and distribution of electric power aboard the ships.

ModificationTitle.val: KK001 - LHD Midlife, Power Management Platform (PMP)

Title.val: KK001 - LHD Midlife, Power Management Platform (PMP)

Name.@footnote: FY14 installation funds are required for installation non-recurring engineering, software development and shipchecks required in advance of the ship availability start in 1Q16.

Description.val: This ship alteration improves the reliability, visibility, and control of the LHD 1 Class ships power system.
